overview: Come with us on a trip back in time to the video archives of classic adult movie entertainment. John Holmes became a legend in his own time; a wildly popular anomoly within the industry and among the general public. This video is a select collection of various scenes that typify the style and image Holmes portryed in his hayday. The footage is dated but the action isn't. It's bone crunching, ass slammin' and pussy hammerin' with a very big dick' at it's best!
title: Boogie Down with John Holmes
